title: Community Immunity Campaign for Vaccination Education
itunes:title: Community Immunity Campaign for Vaccination Education
description:
Dr. Olajide Williams, Chief of Staff of Neurology at Columbia University, discusses his efforts, thru the nonprofit organization Hip Hop Public Health, to educate African Americans about Covid vaccines. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Businessweek P&I Reporter Drake Bennett talk about JetBlue’s founder preparing to launch a new airline despite the pandemic. Bloomberg News U.S. Technology Team Co-Leader Molly Schuetz shares news of Apple upping U.S. investments to $430 billion over the next five years. And we Drive to the Close with Ryan Jacob, Chief Investment Officer at Jacob Asset Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
